tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_contracts_history (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contract_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    deployment_date DATE,
    developer_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_data TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT,
    block_number INT,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES contract_interactions(interaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    deployment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    developer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    blockchain_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE contract_interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(18,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE contract_interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    interaction_type TEXT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_hash TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_variables (
    variable_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    variable_name TEXT,
    variable_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_owners (
    owner_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    owner_name TEXT,
    owner_address TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);
